taskList.title: Collaborating with others to create compelling presentations
taskList.description: Conduct a presentation with your favorite topic and share details as to why you are presenting, how it contributes to your life and what aspect you could improve about it.

taskList.title: Working together to solve problems effectively
taskList.description: Organize a problem-solving session where the team tackles a real or hypothetical issue, brainstorming solutions and implementing the best one together.

taskList.title: Joining forces to successfully complete projects
taskList.description: implement a project where team members are assigned specific roles and responsibilities, requiring regular check-ins and collective effort to achieve the project's goals.
